title: Onigiri
synopsis: Ancient Japan is under attack by powerful beings called "Kamikui," and it is up to the "Oni" and his band of eight beautiful female warriors to stop them. Each of these girls have unique skills, abilities, and personalities. They partner themselves with the Oni, Jin, to stop the miasma of darkness sweeping across Japan.
voices: ['Mimori, Suzuko', 'Suzuki, Aina', 'Matsui, Eriko', 'Hara, Natsuko', 'Kitta, Izumi', 'Nakane, Monya', 'Konishi, Katsuyuki', 'Nakashima, Yuki', 'Mimori, Suzuko']
staff: [['Yamamoto, Takashi', ['Director']], ['Honda, Yasunori', ['Sound Director']], ['Aoshima, Takashi', ['Script']], ['Kouno, Takamitsu', ['Script', ' Series Composition']]]
